name: BirdNoise
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bird noise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bird Noise lets you hear white noise that can help you stay focused, relax and cover up annoying noises.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select this skill.
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/smartskills.it
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
